shorts.content: CARBONDALE, PA, November 13, 2025 — The Defense Logistics Agency (DLA) has exercised the third one-year option period of the Advanced Combat Helmet Generation II (ACH Gen II) production contract (SPE1C1-23-D-0004) awarded to Gentex Corporation. Valued at up t…
shorts.content_distilled: CARBONDALE, PA, November 13, 2025 — The Defense Logistics Agency  has exercised the third one-year option period of the Advanced Combat Helmet Generation II  production contract  awarded to Gentex Corporation.

shorts.title: Request to pause Lackawanna County property reassessment denied
shorts.title_distilled: Request to pause Lackawanna County property reassessment denied.
shorts.description: Lackawanna County is in the middle of its first property tax reassessment in 60 years, but some of the county's commissioners wanted to wait just a little longer.
shorts.content: Lackawanna County is in the middle of its first property tax reassessment in 60 years, but some of the county's commissioners wanted to wait just a little longer.
shorts.content_distilled: Lackawanna County is in the middle of its first property tax reassessment in 60 years, but some of the county's commissioners wanted to wait just a little longer.

shorts.title: Scranton, Williamsport are seeing less snowy winters
shorts.title_distilled: Scranton, Williamsport are seeing less snowy winters.
shorts.description: Snow rates have fallen 25% for Scranton and 15% for Williamsport over the last century
shorts.content: Snow rates have fallen 25% for Scranton and 15% for Williamsport over the last century
shorts.content_distilled: Snow rates have fallen 25% for Scranton and 15% for Williamsport over the last century.

shorts.title: Gas outage affecting parts of West Scranton
shorts.title_distilled: Gas outage affecting parts of West Scranton.
shorts.description: SCRANTON, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — UGI crews and the Scranton Fire Department are responding to a gas outage affecting homes in West Scranton, with utilities expected to be restored by mid- to late morning on Saturday, November 15. The outage has impacted several streets in the area, including Mt. Vernon Ave., W. Gibson St., N. Sumner Ave., [...]
shorts.content: SCRANTON, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — UGI crews and the Scranton Fire Department are responding to a gas outage affecting homes in West Scranton, with utilities expected to be restored by mid- to late morning on Saturday, November 15. The outage has impacted several streets in the area, including Mt. Vernon Ave., W. Gibson St., N. Sumner Ave., [...]
shorts.content_distilled: SCRANTON, LACKAWANNA COUNTY  — UGI crews and the Scranton Fire Department are responding to a gas outage affecting homes in West Scranton, with utilities expected to be restored by mid- to late morning on Saturday, November 15.
